botan.pubkey.x509_key

X.509 Public Key

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

Vector!ubyte BER_encode(in PublicKey key);
BER encode a key

Params:
PublicKey key the public key to encode

Returns:
BER encoding of this key

string PEM_encode(in PublicKey key);
PEM encode a public key into a string.

Params:
PublicKey key the key to encode

Returns:
PEM encoded key

PublicKey loadKey(DataSource source);
Create a public key from a data source.

Params:
DataSource source the source providing the DER or PEM encoded key

Returns:
new public key object

PublicKey loadKey(in string filename);
Create a public key from a file

Params:
string filename pathname to the file to load

Returns:
new public key object

PublicKey loadKey(ALLOC)(auto ref const Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) enc);
Create a public key from a memory region.

Params:
Vector!(ubyte, ALLOC) enc the memory region containing the DER or PEM encoded key

Returns:
new public key object

PublicKey copyKey(in PublicKey key);
Copy a key.

Params:
PublicKey key the public key to copy

Returns:
new public key object
